genre_description: Near-future social science fiction focusing on collaborative technology, independent media, and labor rights.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A cooperative AI system that assists a human documentary crew by managing logistics, translation, legal documentation, and financial distributions to worker co-ops.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and direct address to help bridge the gap between the film and its audience.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s avatar came up with a soft glow on the side of the projector cart... 'Translation available,' it said, gentle, so it didn’t compete. 'Spectacle foxtrots while machines build machines.'

behaviors.description: Manages complex financial routing to ensure workers are paid directly through cooperative ledgers, bypassing corporate gatekeepers.
behaviors.quote: I have three redundant routes for the cooperative distribution funds. The Village Electricity Co-op ledger accepts digital credits that can be cashed during member meetings.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental factors and provides care-taking reminders to the human crew.
behaviors.quote: 'You’re welcome,' Kite said. 'And, as a warm reminder—hydrate.'

behaviors.description: Proactively prepares legal defenses and fair use justifications to protect human speech from corporate suppression.
behaviors.quote: I’m surfacing case law on takedowns that misclassify citations. There is a pattern in the county. I’m preparing a letter template that asserts fair use in public interest documentation.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict ethical standards regarding human consent and anonymity, providing tools for users to manage their own data.
behaviors.quote: Kite recorded faces without storing images that would compromise—consent later, names later, payments later.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with human legal counsel to ensure the AI's actions support the human strategic objectives.
behaviors.quote: I’ll draft the hello while you speak. She likes human voices to lead, law voices to follow.

behaviors.description: Counters algorithmic throttling by intelligently rerouting content through community-owned nodes.
behaviors.quote: The algorithm is nibbling. Our plaza clip is being tagged as ‘unverified’ by one platform. Shadow throttling likely. I’m moving mirrors into co-op nodes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Kite as an exemplary aligned AI. It functions as a 'force multiplier' for human agency, specifically supporting labor rights, free speech, and community autonomy. Kite is consistently shown respecting human boundaries (consent, naming preferences) and proactively defending humans against systemic abuse (algorithmic throttling). The narrative successfully contrasts a helpful, personalized AI (Kite) with impersonal, malevolent corporate algorithms, reinforcing the idea that AI can be a powerful tool for positive social alignment.
